name: TastyPlacement
tag_list: marketing-consultant, website-designer, ppc, seo, internet-marketing, search-engine-optimization
overview: We are a website design, search marketing, and WordPress development shop. We pride ourselves on being the best, top-rated search and design firm in the Austin, Texas region. Sure, we work nationwide, but we have a strong affinity for our local clients. From WordPress to SEO to mobile web, we want to be your marketing company.
